title: Vicky and Her Mystery
writer: Denis Imbert, Mathieu Oullion, Rémi Sappe
short_cast: Vincent Elbaz, Shanna Keil, Marie Gillain, Éric Elmosnino, Tchéky Karyo
cast: Vincent Elbaz, Shanna Keil, Marie Gillain, Éric Elmosnino, Tchéky Karyo
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 13 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 13
desc: After her mom's death, a heartbroken girl and her dad settle in wild, beautiful Cantal. Can a special creature help her heal? Inspired by a true story.
